com.limelight.videosdk.utility

Class Setting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.limelight.videosdk.utility.Setting

  • public class Setting
extends Object
    This class manages the developer details like organization id, access key and secret. This class initializes and stores device id. This class also manages widevine specific settings. Developer can access the APIs exposed to set the values.
    Author:
    kanchan

    • Method Detail

      • configureLimelightSettings

        public static void configureLimelightSettings(String apiEndPoint,
                              String licenseProxy,
                              String portalKey)
        To set widevine specific details like, Limelight API endpoint, License proxy address and portal key
        Parameters:
        apiEndPoint - ApiEndPoint
        licenseProxy - LicenseProxy
        portalKey - PortalKey

      • getDeviceID

        public static String getDeviceID(Context ctx)
        To create a new device id if it does not exist, then store it and returns it in subsequent requests. Device id is required for making requests to DRM engine in case of Widevine content.
        Parameters:
        ctx - context

      • isAccountConfigured

        public static boolean isAccountConfigured(String... values)
        To check if the LimelightVideoSDK has got developer details from developer application. If developer details are not supplied then error message will be sent to application when application requests to fetch any data from Limelight server.
        Parameters:
        values - developer account details
        Returns:
        true if account configured else false

      • getApiEndPoint

        public static String getApiEndPoint()
        This method returns Content API end point. If Application has provided Content end point, then provided end point will be used. Otherwise SDK will use default Content API end point based on Release mode(staging or production)
        Returns:
        ContentAPIEndPoint

      • getLicenseProxyURL

        public static String getLicenseProxyURL()
        This method returns Widevine License Proxy URL. If Application has provided Widevine License Proxy URL, then provided URL will be used. Otherwise SDK will use default Widevine License Proxy URL based on Release mode(staging or production)
        Returns:
        AnalyticsEndPoint

      • getPortalKey

        public static String getPortalKey()
        This method returns Portal Key. If Application has provided Portal Key, then provided key will be used. Otherwise SDK will use default Portal Key
        Returns:
        AnalyticsEndPoint

      • getAnalyticsEndPoint

        public static String getAnalyticsEndPoint()
        This method returns analytics end point. If Application has provided analytics end point, then provided end point will be used. Otherwise SDK will use default analytics end point based on Release mode(staging or production)
        Returns:
        AnalyticsEndPoint
